mapper.select: SELECT `MEMBER_ID` , `EMAIL` , `PASSWORD` , `MEMBER_NM` , `PHONE_NUM` , `PARTY` , `GRADE_ID` , `REG_DT` , EXISTS ( select restrict_id FROM restrict_member WHERE MEMBER_ID = cm.MEMBER_ID AND RESTRICT_SHOW=TRUE) as RESTRRICT FROM CLASS_MEMBER cm WHERE `MEMBER_ID` = #{member_id}
SELECT `CLASS_ID` , `CLASS_NM` , `CLASS_YMD` , EXISTS(SELECT * FROM COURSE_REGISTRATION CR WHERE CR.`CLASS_ID` = CC.`CLASS_ID` AND CR.`MEMBER_ID` = #{member_id}) AS registerClassYN FROM CLASS_CODE CC

SELECT CLASS_ID , (SELECT CLASS_NM FROM CLASS_CODE CC WHERE CC.CLASS_ID = CR.CLASS_ID) AS CLASS_NM , (SELECT CLASS_YMD FROM CLASS_CODE CC WHERE CC.CLASS_ID = CR.CLASS_ID) AS CLASS_YMD FROM COURSE_REGISTRATION CR WHERE `MEMBER_ID`=#{member_id};
SELECT `CB_TYPE` , `BOARD_ID` , `CLASS_ID` , (SELECT BOARD_NM FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_ID = CBT.BOARD_ID) AS BOARD_NM, CB_SHOW FROM CLASS_BOARD_TYPE CBT WHERE CLASS_ID =#{class_id};
